<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- X86OptimizeLEAs.cpp - optimize usage of LEA instructions -----------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file defines the pass that performs some optimizations with LEA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions in order to improve performance and code size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently, it does two things:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) If there are two LEA instructions calculating addresses which only differ</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    by displacement inside a basic block, one of them is removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) Address calculations in load and store instructions are replaced by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    existing LEA def registers where possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315" lineLink="#a5b111dc93b0f18920f5656c9e5f8c539"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#af807c9595d50b45c0008924c4679c85c">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86optimizeleas-cpp-/x86optimizeleapass/#a07a35a50b5670e8ab826b999a09a77ef">X86OptimizeLEAPass</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;X86 optimize LEA pass&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">int <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86optimizeleas-cpp-/x86optimizeleapass/#a07a35a50b5670e8ab826b999a09a77ef">X86OptimizeLEAPass</a>::calcInstrDist(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Both instructions must be in the same basic block and they must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// presented in InstrPos.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>.getParent() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>.getParent() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Instructions are in different basic blocks&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(InstrPos.contains(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>) &amp;&amp; InstrPos.contains(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstrPos&#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>&#93; - InstrPos&#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the best LEA instruction in the List to replace address recalculation in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MI. Such LEA must meet these requirements:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) The address calculated by the LEA differs only by the displacement from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    the address used in MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) The register class of the definition of the LEA is compatible with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    register class of the address base register of MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3) Displacement of the new memory operand should fit in 1 byte if possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 4) The LEA should be as close to MI as possible, and prior to it if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> X86OptimizeLEAPass::chooseBestLEA(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MachineInstr &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;List, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;BestLEA, int64&#95;t &amp;AddrDispShift, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Dist) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &#42;MF = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc">MCInstrDesc</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getDesc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemOpNo = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#ad571a5a542b484586224d3a8df631646">X86II::getMemoryOperandNo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a>.TSFlags) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">                <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#af0baab1b1dfea49cbffeb8727aebd429">X86II::getOperandBias</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BestLEA = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop over all LEA instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a> : List) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get new address displacement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t AddrDispShiftTemp = getAddrDispShift(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, MemOpNo, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a>, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure address displacement fits 4 bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;32&gt;</a>(AddrDispShiftTemp))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that LEA def register can be used as MI address base. Some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions can use a limited set of registers as address base, for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example MOV8mr&#95;NOREX. We could constrain the register class of the LEA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// def to suit MI, however since this case is very rare and hard to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reproduce in a test it&#39;s just more reliable to skip the LEA.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getRegClass(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a>, MemOpNo + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#a2a5aec578e2e391e99e1705012752d84a319f0e99a1ac9396659683d2638d4f45">X86::AddrBaseReg</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>, &#42;MF) !=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;getRegClass(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a>-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Choose the closest LEA instruction from the list, prior to MI if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible. Note that we took into account resulting address displacement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as well. Also note that the list is sorted by the order in which the LEAs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occur, so the break condition is pretty simple.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DistTemp = calcInstrDist(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DistTemp != 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;The distance between two different instructions cannot be zero&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DistTemp &gt; 0 || BestLEA == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not update return LEA, if the current one provides a displacement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which fits in 1 byte, while the new candidate does not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BestLEA != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;8&gt;</a>(AddrDispShiftTemp) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;8&gt;</a>(AddrDispShift))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BestLEA = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AddrDispShift = AddrDispShiftTemp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Dist = DistTemp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Maybe we should not always stop at the first LEA after MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DistTemp &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BestLEA != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the difference between the addresses&#39; displacements of the two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions \\p MI1 and \\p MI2. The numbers of the first memory operands are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// passed through \\p N1 and \\p N2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">int64&#95;t X86OptimizeLEAPass::getAddrDispShift(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;MI1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> N1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;MI2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> N2)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;Op1 = MI1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(N1 + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#a2a5aec578e2e391e99e1705012752d84a93474770cf1401679ba37e1833632e58">X86::AddrDisp</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calculation is rather simple.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the Last LEA can be replaced by the First LEA. To be so,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these requirements must be met:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) Addresses calculated by LEAs differ only by displacement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) Def registers of LEAs belong to the same class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3) All uses of the Last LEA def register are replaceable, thus the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    register is used only as address base.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> X86OptimizeLEAPass::findLEAs(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pos = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assign the position number to the instruction. Note that we are going to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// move some instructions during the optimization however there will never</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be a need to move two instructions before any selected instruction. So to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// avoid multiple positions&#39; updates during moves we just increase position</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// counter by two leaving a free space for instructions which will be moved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InstrPos&#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>&#93; = Pos += 2;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to find load and store instructions which recalculate addresses already</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calculated by some LEA and replace their memory operands with its def</span></CodeLine>
